lead_paragraph: Basketball legend Michael Jordan spoke out on police violence on Monday and announced two $1 million grants, to civil rights group NAACP's Legal Defense Fund and to a group that works on improving police relations with communities.

headline.main: Michael Jordan Speaks Against Both Police Killings, Targeting of Police
headline.print_headline: Michael Jordan Speaks Against Both Police Killings, Targeting of Police

snippet: Basketball legend Michael Jordan spoke out on police violence on Monday and announced two $1 million grants, to civil rights group NAACP's Legal Defense Fund and to a group that works on improving police relations with communities....
